data.title: MyBusiness Partners
data.meta_description: Our group of leaders are professionally competent and have extensive practice in their field of expertise both domestic and/or overseas projects. Given their track record, mBP is confident that its customers gets good services and/or products they deserve to their full satisfaction. Board of Directors Bonifacio Manuel Board Chairman Read More Executive Director Read More …
data.text:
Engineering Manager

Electrodynamics Construction and Development Inc. (ECDI), Pasig City, Philippines, in 2009-2014

for Isuzu Plant project, Cabuyao Laguna and a Structural Engineer of a five(5) storey company’s office at Danny Floro Street, Pasig City, Philippines; Anvaya Beach resort, Morong Bataan, 6 storey Building, ECDI Bldg, Pasig City; AUB Building Mechanical Works, Ortigas; and PLDT Architectural Fit out, Novaliches.

Junior Civil Engineer and rose to the rank of Group Engineering Supervisors,

Engineering Equipment Incorporated (EEI), Manila since 1978 to 2001

During his stint as an Engineer of EEI, he was involved in Irrigation Projects, various Power Plants Projects, the Pantabangan HEP, PSPC’s Power Generation project, Haneda Power Plant, Yamamura Power Plant project, 50-MW Hi Cement Power plant. Also, engaged in overseas projects for Al Khalejia Bldg. Safat, Kuwait.

Civil Engineer Trainee

Department Bureau of Public Works, Port Area, Manila, in 1975

His short stay in the Bureau, brought him worked as Civil Engineering Assistant in Roblett Industrial Const. Corp. Malate, Manila in 1975 to 1978 where he was engaged in various civil design, estimating and construction works.

Department Head and Professor,Mechanical Engineering, Automotive, Diesel and Machine Shop Department

FEATI University 1979 – 2002.

Responsible in formulating specific action plans in order to have an effective and efficient way of impacting technical knowledge to M.E. students in the course of Machine Design, Power Plant Design, Industrial Plant Design, Heat Transfer, etc.

Section Head, National Grid Corporation of the Philippines.

Responsible in conducting desktop studies for the selection of cable terminal station and landfall of power cables, marine power cable route surveys and engineering feasibility study of interconnection projects (Cebu-Negros, Cebu-Bohol, Batangas-Mindoro, Visayas-Mindanao Interconnection Projects); engineering geological and geotechnical investigation, selection and assessment of new substation sites and transmission line routes; slope stability analysis of critical tower sites; and, assessment of possible risks to new and existing tower sites and substations.

Division Manager, Geology and Geotechnics Division, National Transmission Corporation (TRANSCO), 2003-2009

Responsible in the engineering geological and geotechnical investigation, selection and assessment of new substation sites and transmission line routes; slope stability analysis of critical tower sites; and, assessment of possible risks to new and existing tower sites and substations.

Principal Geologist A (Section Head), Engineering Geology Section, National Power Corporation, 1981 - 2003.

Responsible in the engineering geological and geotechnical investigation and assessment of hydro/power plant and substation sites and transmission line routes; groundwater exploration and development including testing and analysis of deepwell data, etc.

Chief Technology Officer

Gsparks Pte Ltd (Singapore)

which is in- charge of the technology aspect of the company that focuses primarily on the current trend in IT Solutions.

Technical Manager and Business Development Manager

Cast Laboratories Pte Ltd (Singapore)

involved in an R&D project that was funded through government grants in which the company had invested in developing an online cube testing system for their productivity gain.

Lecturer

Institute of Technical Education (Singapore)

for 9 years and taught subject in the field of Electronic Engineering and Information Technology and conducting research in the areas of wireless communication, microcontroller technology, voice recognition, software engineering, and networking. Developed new modules needed for the electronics course. Also as Technologist, Initiate, test, and implement industry projects, establishing networks and linkages with the industry. As a Counselor, counseling students to be more focus and well trained in their field of study.

Design Engineer

for two years which was part of a design team that includes scientists and engineers responsible and dedicated in custom-design and fabrication of robotics automation equipment that meets the demand and requirement of a particular industry. Also include plan-detailed design, fabrication, commissioning and testing of robotics equipment

Warehouse Supervisor,

Global Business Power Corporation (Panay Power Corp & Panay Development Corp, 2010-Present.

Directs & Supervises the implementation of Warehousing policies & procedures; Ensures that all company purchased materials and services are properly accounted and documented; Observes and enforces Quality, Environment, Safety and Health (QESH) programs, rules and regulation.

Senior Materials Management Specialist,

Supervising Shipping Officer, Supervising Materials Planning Officer of Materials Management Dept., National Power Corp, 1992-2003.

Timely shipment/delivery/issuance of requisitioned materials, supplies and equipment intended to various cost center and plants in support to their operations in the least cost and effective manner; Proper documentation of warehouse transactions.

Supervising Warehouse Officer,

Warehouse Stock Analyst, Warehousing / Shipping Assistant A, Receiving/Shipping Processor of Materials Management Dept., National Power Corp, 1981-1992.

Accuracy of inventory record and updated on time through the computer-based data system; Implementation of the necessary safety measures and good housekeeping in the warehouse and surroundings to avert losses and destruction of properties.

Assistant General Counsel, National Power Corporation (NPC), Diliman, Quezon City, 1981-2013.

Advised top management of NPC and NPC Board concerning corporate and contract transactions, claim liabilities, advisability of prosecuting or defending lawsuits, or legal rights and obligations of the Corporation.

Legal Consultant/Adviser, National Power Corporation, Diliman Quezon City

Group member/adviser on Bids and Awards Committee and various BAC-Technical Working Groups and other project oriented groups/committees involving foreign and local funded projects. Participated in the bidding and evaluation of bids and award for major NPC projects such as Hydro Power Plants, Geothermal Power Plants, Gas Turbine Power Plants and various Transmission Lines & Substation Projects.
